headline: Everest Group (EG): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Everest Group (EG) shares have pulled back over the past month, reflecting a cooling period in the insurance sector. Investors may be weighing recent earnings growth against declines in annual revenue as they reassess the company’s longer-term prospects. See our latest analysis for Everest Group. After climbing earlier in the year, Everest Group’s share price has recently lost some momentum, slipping 8.25% over the past month and 11.83% year-to-date. Even so, the company’s 5-year total...
